Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO LOCAL GOVERNMENT

Title: Relates to prohibiting compensation for certain auditing services on a contingent basis
Summary: Prohibits compensation for service of auditing relating to any tax, interest or penalty on a contingent basis.
LawCode: Add ยง39-a, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to prohibiting compensation for service of auditing relating to any tax on a contingency basis
